comments.comment: Ape hamuduruwane thanha asa kroda nathi ayekuta pamanai rata bera gatha hakke.palanaya kala hakiwanne.mulu srilankikayan ratata jathiyata agamata adare athi garu karana nithiya akuratama kriyathmaka karana obawahanse janadipathiwaranayata illanna.ape rata jathiya agamata api godak adrei .oya dewal 3 ma rakiya hakke  obaweni ayekuta pamanai.oya enna dagalana aththo ratata jathiyata agamata arare naha.kiyavillak pamani porondu.mulu srilankikayanta jeevithe karadarayak nathiwa gewanna puluwan obawani budda puthrayek palanaya rata palanaya kaloth.buduradundesu darmaya lowa kalpaganak pawathinnase obawahanseda mage lak manita ethumiyage araksawata ehumiya sewane husma ganna apata sawanallak vi araksawa denna budusaranai.apa siyaludenagema pathuma ituwewa
